title: Who is Liam Hemsworth’s new girlfriend, Dynasty star Maddison Brown?
text:
Maddison Brown has been seen holding hands with Liam Hemsworth (Picture: Scott Ehler/WireImage for Witchery)

Liam Hemsworth has been keeping a fairly low profile since his split from Miley Cyrus was announced.

That was until he was snapped out and about with his rumoured new girlfriend, Dynasty actress Maddison Brown.

Miley Cyrus and husband Liam Hemsworth announced they were going their separate ways less than a year after tying the knot and 10 years after they started dating back in August 2009.

Since then Miley has been romantically linked to Kaitlynn Carter and Cody Simpson – and had to blast trolls for ‘slut-shaming’ her newly single dating life. Liam meanwhile has been hunkered down in Australia with his famous family, until now.

The 29-year-old was papped holding hands with his new girlfriend in New York City this week, although reports state that the actor is keen to take it slow with Maddison following his tumultuous relationship with Miley.

Who is Liam Hemsworth’s new girlfriend Maddison Brown?

Maddison Brown is a 22-year-old actress who, like Liam, is from Australia.

Maddison Brown with some of the cast from Strangerland in 2015 (Picture: by Larry Busacca/Getty Images)

Maddison is best known for playing Kirby Anders on the Dynasty reboot on Netflix, and she also had a role in Strangerland opposite Nicole Kidman in 2015.

The actress first appeared on TV in Home and Away in 2007 just like many other Australian stars who have subsequently made it over in the US and Hollywood (see Kylie Minogue, Liam, his brother Chris Hemsworth and Margot Robbie to name just a few)

Her other TV role was playing Young Anna Macy in Foxtel drama The Kettering Incident back in 2016.

Maddison is no stranger to the FROW either. (Picture: Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images for Miu Miu)

As well as acting Maddison has worked as a model, featuring in Vogue Australia and walking the runway for Calvin Klein and Miu Miu.

It is not clear yet how or when Liam and Maddison met but it appears that she was already crushing on Liam long before their first date, as in June 2019, Maddison appeared on the Zach Sang Show and during a game of ‘f**k, kill, marry’ she revealed that she would be down to ‘f**k the Hemsworth brothers’. Blimey.

‘I am going to kill Hugh Jackman, I am going marry Margot Robbie as I would like to f**k her for life, and then I will f**k the Hemsworth brothers but at the same time the both of them,’ she told Zach.
